attributes.action: dads who can't see kids due to mums not to pay maintenance
attributes.background: Dads who can't see their kids due to the mothers actions or who falsely make accusations so that they can't see their kids shouldn't be paying maintenance

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
